description: Current maintenance policy and procedures documentation, including roles, responsibilities, and approval authority
Evidence of annual review and updates to maintenance policy and procedures
Maintenance schedules and records for system components, including dates, descriptions, and personnel involved
Approval records for off-site maintenance, repair, or replacement activities
Media sanitization procedures and records for equipment removed for off-site maintenance
Post-maintenance verification testing records demonstrating controls are functioning properly
List of approved maintenance tools and annual review documentation
Inspection records for maintenance tools checking for unauthorized modifications or malicious code
Procedures and records for preventing unauthorized removal of maintenance equipment containing organizational information
Nonlocal maintenance approval and monitoring records, including session logs and authentication methods
Strong authentication mechanisms documentation for nonlocal maintenance sessions (e.g., multi-factor authentication, PKI certificates)
List of authorized maintenance personnel and organizations, including access authorization verification records
Escort and supervision procedures for maintenance personnel without appropriate security clearances
Maintenance support contracts and spare parts inventory for critical system components
Service level agreements or documentation supporting advertised uptime and availability requirements
